DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare glycemic control ( HbA1c ) Chinese patient type 1 type 2 diabetes treat insulin lispro low mixture human insulin 30/70 .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Patients With Diabetes Mellitus ( IOPA )
DOC.criteria: Clinically diagnose type 1or type 2 diabetes least 2 month Aged 18 70 ( inclusive ) Have treat human insulin mix 30/70 twice daily least 2 month prior enter study Have glycosylated hemoglobin ( Hb1Ac ) 1.2 1.7 time upper limit normal reference range within 2 week prior Visit 1 Compliance diet insulin therapy performs regular blood glucose monitoring Have use oral antidiabetic agent within 30 day prior entry study Receive total daily dose insulin > 2 units/kilogram Have two episode severe hypoglycemia within 6 month prior entry study Have body mass index > 35 kilogram per square meter ( kg/m2 ) Receive chronic systemic glucocorticoid therapy
